<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Slingshot" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Slingshot</a> <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_attacks#Senton" title="Professional wrestling attacks">somersault senton</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Springboard" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Springboard</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Diving_clothesline&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Diving clothesline (page does not exist)">clothesline</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-WDProfile_295-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WDProfile-295">[295]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_attacks#High_knee" title="Professional wrestling attacks">Step-up high knee</a> to a cornered opponent<sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup> followed by a <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_throws#Bulldog" title="Professional wrestling throws">bulldog</a><sup id="cite_ref-move1_88-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-move1-88">[88]</a></sup> or a <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_attacks#Short_arm_clothesline" title="Professional wrestling attacks">short-arm clothesline</a><sup id="cite_ref-vsJericho2013_296-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-vsJericho2013-296">[296]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Suicide" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Suicide dive</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Frankensteiner" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Super frankensteiner</a><sup id="cite_ref-PW3_306-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PW3-306">[306]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-307" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-307">[307]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=Tilt-a-whirl_backbreaker&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Tilt-a-whirl backbreaker (page does not exist)">Tilt-a-whirl backbreaker</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><i>Welcome To Chicago...</i>(<a href="/wiki/Backbreaker#Double_underhook_backbreaker" title="Backbreaker">Double underhook backbreaker</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-WDProfile_295-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WDProfile-295">[295]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-308" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-308">[308]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Independent_circuit" title="Independent circuit">Independent circuit</a></b>
<ul>
<li><b>Finishing moves</b>
<ul>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_holds#Anaconda_vise" title="Professional wrestling holds">Anaconda vise</a> or an <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_holds#Arm_triangle_choke" title="Professional wrestling holds">arm triangle choke</a><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><i>Pepsi Plunge</i><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Facebuster&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Facebuster (page does not exist)">Diving</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=The_Pedigree&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="The Pedigree (page does not exist)">double underhook facebuster</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_attacks#Shining_Wizard" title="Professional wrestling attacks">Shining wizard</a><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b>Signature moves</b>
<ul>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_holds#Armbar" title="Professional wrestling holds">Arm wrench</a> followed by stepping a leg over the wrenched arm and performing a <a href="/w/index.php?title=Mule_kick&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Mule kick (page does not exist)">mule kick</a> with the leg below the opponent's face<sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Corkscrew" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Corkscrew dive</a> transitioned into a <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Flying_neckbreaker" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">diving neckbreaker</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><i>Crooked Moonsault</i> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Moonsault&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Moonsault (page does not exist)">Split-legged moonsault</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-WDProfile_295-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WDProfile-295">[295]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Suplex#Delayed_vertical_suplex" title="Suplex">Delayed vertical suplex</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><i>Devil Lock DDT</i><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_holds#Hammerlock" title="Professional wrestling holds">Hammerlock</a> <a href="/wiki/DDT_(professional_wrestling)#Legsweep_DDT" title="DDT (professional wrestling)">legsweep DDT</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_attacks#Facewash" title="Professional wrestling attacks">Facewash</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Backbreaker#Inverted_facelock_backbreaker" title="Backbreaker">Inverted facelock backbreaker</a><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Inverted_frankensteiner" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Inverted frankensteiner</a><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><i>Jackie Chan</i><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup> (While sitting in a corner, grasps the top rope with one hand on each side of the turnbuckle and when the opponent attempts to pull him off the ropes by his legs, he performs a <a href="/w/index.php?title=Flip_(acrobatic)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Flip (acrobatic) (page does not exist)">back tuck</a>, landing on his feet)
</li>
<li><i>Pepsi Twist</i><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_holds#Hammerlock" title="Professional wrestling holds">Jumping hammerlock</a> <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_attacks#Spinning_headlock_elbow_drop" title="Professional wrestling attacks">twisted into a</a> <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_attacks#Lariat" title="Professional wrestling attacks">short-range lariat</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><i>Punk-Handle Piledriver</i><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/Piledriver_(professional_wrestling)#Pumphandle_reverse_piledriver" title="Piledriver (professional wrestling)">Pumphandle reverse piledriver</a>)
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_throws#Fireman.27s_carry_slam" title="Professional wrestling throws">Rolling fireman's carry slam</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Slingshot" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Slingshot</a> <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_attacks#Senton" title="Professional wrestling attacks">somersault senton</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Springboard" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Springboard</a> <a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Corkscrew" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">corkscrew</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Diving_Crossbody&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Diving Crossbody (page does not exist)">crossbody</a><sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Professional_wrestling_aerial_techniques#Suicide" title="Professional wrestling aerial techniques">Suicide dive</a><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><i>Welcome to Chicago, Motherfucker</i><sup id="cite_ref-officialsite_303-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-officialsite-303">[303]</a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/Backbreaker#Double_underhook_backbreaker" title="Backbreaker">Double underhook backbreaker</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-23" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=Straight_Edge_Society&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Straight Edge Society (page does not exist)">Straight Edge Society</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Serena_Deeb&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Serena Deeb (page does not exist)">Serena</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=Drew_Hankinson&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Drew Hankinson (page does not exist)">Luke Gallows</a>, &amp; <a href="/wiki/Adam_Birch" title="Adam Birch">Joseph Mercury</a>)

</li>

<li><b><a href="/wiki/Music_in_professional_wrestling" title="Music in professional wrestling">Entrance themes</a></b>
<ul>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Independent_circuit" title="Independent circuit">Independent circuit</a></b>
<ul>
<li>"South of Heaven" by <a href="/wiki/Slayer" title="Slayer">Slayer</a><sup id="cite_ref-319" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-319">[319]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>"A Call for Blood" by <a href="/wiki/Hatebreed" title="Hatebreed">Hatebreed</a><sup id="cite_ref-Music_320-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Music-320">[320]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>"Miseria Cantare (The Beginning)" by <a href="/wiki/AFI_(band)" title="AFI (band)">AFI</a><sup id="cite_ref-Music_320-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Music-320">[320]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>"<a href="/w/index.php?title=Cult_of_Personality_(song)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Cult of Personality (song) (page does not exist)">Cult of Personality</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Living_Colour" title="Living Colour">Living Colour</a><sup id="cite_ref-321" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-321">[321]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>"Night Train" by <a href="/wiki/The_Bouncing_Souls" title="The Bouncing Souls">The Bouncing Souls</a><sup id="cite_ref-322" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-322">[322]</a></sup>
</li>

</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/WWE" title="WWE">World Wrestling Entertainment</a></b>
<ul>
<li>"This Fire Burns" by <a href="/wiki/Killswitch_Engage" title="Killswitch Engage">Killswitch Engage</a> (August 1, 2006 – July 17, 2011)<sup id="cite_ref-WWEprofile_323-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WWEprofile-323">[323]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><b>"<a href="/w/index.php?title=Cult_of_Personality_(song)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Cult of Personality (song) (page does not exist)">Cult of Personality</a>"</b> by <a href="/wiki/Living_Colour" title="Living Colour">Living Colour</a> (July 25, 2011–present)<sup id="cite_ref-324" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-324">[324]</a></sup>
</li>

</ul>
<ul>
<li><b><a href="/w/index.php?title=Glossary_of_professional_wrestling_terms&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Glossary of professional wrestling terms (page does not exist)">Wrestlers trained</a></b>
</li>
</ul>
<table>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<dl>
<dd><ul>

</li>

</li>

</li>

</dd>
</dl>
</td>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Championships_and_accomplishments">Championships and accomplishments</span></h2>
<p><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Multiple_image&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Multiple image (page does not exist)">Template:Multiple image</a>
</p>
<ul>
<li><b><a href="/w/index.php?title=Independent_Wrestling_Association_Mid-South&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Independent Wrestling Association Mid-South (page does not exist)">Independent Wrestling Association Mid-South</a></b>
<ul>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=IWA_Mid-South_Heavyweight_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="IWA Mid-South Heavyweight Championship (page does not exist)">IWA Mid-South Heavyweight Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=IWA_Mid-South_Heavyweight_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="IWA Mid-South Heavyweight Championship (page does not exist)">5 times</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-325" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-325">[325]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=IWA_Mid-South_Light_Heavyweight_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="IWA Mid-South Light Heavyweight Championship (page does not exist)">IWA Mid-South Light Heavyweight Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=IWA_Mid-South_Light_Heavyweight_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="IWA Mid-South Light Heavyweight Championship (page does not exist)">2 times</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-326" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-326">[326]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b>International Wrestling Cartel</b>
<ul>
<li>IWC World Heavyweight Championship (1 time)<sup id="cite_ref-327" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-327">[327]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b>Mid-American Wrestling</b>
<ul>
<li>MAW Heavyweight Championship (1 time)<sup id="cite_ref-328" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-328">[328]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/w/index.php?title=NWA_Shockwave&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="NWA Shockwave (page does not exist)">NWA Cyberspace</a></b>
<ul>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=NWA_Shockwave_Tag_Team_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="NWA Shockwave Tag Team Championship (page does not exist)">NWA Cyberspace Tag Team Championship</a> (1 time)<sup id="cite_ref-329" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-329">[329]</a></sup> – with <a href="/wiki/Julio_Dinero" title="Julio Dinero">Julio Dinero</a>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/National_Wrestling_Alliance" title="National Wrestling Alliance">NWA Revolution</a></b>
<ul>
<li>NWA Revolution Heavyweight Championship (1 time)<sup id="cite_ref-owwpunk_17-30" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-owwpunk-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Ohio_Valley_Wrestling" title="Ohio Valley Wrestling">Ohio Valley Wrestling</a></b>
<ul>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=OVW_Heavyweight_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="OVW Heavyweight Championship (page does not exist)">OVW Heavyweight Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=OVW_Heavyweight_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="OVW Heavyweight Championship (page does not exist)">1 time</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-330" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-330">[330]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=OVW_Southern_Tag_Team_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="OVW Southern Tag Team Championship (page does not exist)">OVW Southern Tag Team Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=OVW_Southern_Tag_Team_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="OVW Southern Tag Team Championship (page does not exist)">1 time</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-331" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-331">[331]</a></sup> – with <a href="/w/index.php?title=Steven_Adkins&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Steven Adkins (page does not exist)">Seth Skyfire</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=OVW_Television_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="OVW Television Championship (page does not exist)">OVW Television Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=OVW_Television_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="OVW Television Championship (page does not exist)">1 time</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-332" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-332">[332]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=Triple_Crown_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Triple Crown Championship (page does not exist)">Second OVW Triple Crown Champion</a>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Pro_Wrestling_Illustrated" title="Pro Wrestling Illustrated">Pro Wrestling Illustrated</a></b>
<ul>
<li><a href="/wiki/PWI" title="PWI" class="mw-redirect">PWI</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=PWI_Feud_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="PWI Feud of the Year (page does not exist)">Feud of the Year</a> (2011)<sup id="cite_ref-333" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-333">[333]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li> <a href="/wiki/PWI" title="PWI" class="mw-redirect">PWI</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=PWI_Match_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="PWI Match of the Year (page does not exist)">Match of the Year</a> (2011)<sup id="cite_ref-334" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-334">[334]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/PWI" title="PWI" class="mw-redirect">PWI</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=PWI_Most_Popular_Wrestler_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="PWI Most Popular Wrestler of the Year (page does not exist)">Most Popular Wrestler of the Year</a> (2011)<sup id="cite_ref-335" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-335">[335]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/PWI" title="PWI" class="mw-redirect">PWI</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=PWI_Most_Hated_Wrestler_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="PWI Most Hated Wrestler of the Year (page does not exist)">Most Hated Wrestler of the Year</a> (2012)
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/PWI" title="PWI" class="mw-redirect">PWI</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=PWI_Wrestler_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="PWI Wrestler of the Year (page does not exist)">Wrestler of the Year</a> (2011, 2012)<sup id="cite_ref-336" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-336">[336]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>PWI ranked him #<b>1</b> of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the <a href="/w/index.php?title=PWI_500&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="PWI 500 (page does not exist)">PWI 500</a> in 2012<sup id="cite_ref-PWI112_337-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PWI112-337">[337]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-338" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-338">[338]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/w/index.php?title=Revolver_(magazine)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Revolver (magazine) (page does not exist)">Revolver</a></b>
<ul>
<li>Golden Gods Award for "Most Metal Athlete" (2012)<sup id="cite_ref-339" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-339">[339]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Ring_of_Honor" title="Ring of Honor">Ring of Honor</a></b>
<ul>
<li><a href="/wiki/ROH_World_Tag_Team_Championship" title="ROH World Tag Team Championship">ROH Tag Team Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_ROH_World_Tag_Team_Champions&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of ROH World Tag Team Champions (page does not exist)">2 times</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-ROH_21-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-ROH-21">[21]</a></sup> – with <a href="/wiki/Colt_Cabana" title="Colt Cabana">Colt Cabana</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ROH_World_Championship" title="ROH World Championship">ROH World Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_ROH_World_Champions&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of ROH World Champions (page does not exist)">1 time</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-ROH_21-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-ROH-21">[21]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b>St. Paul Championship Wrestling</b>
<ul>
<li>SDW Northern States Television Championship (2 times)<sup id="cite_ref-cagematchde_226-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-cagematchde-226">[226]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>SPCW Northern States Light Heavyweight Championship (1 time)<sup id="cite_ref-cagematchde_226-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-cagematchde-226">[226]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/WWE" title="WWE">World Wrestling Entertainment/WWE</a></b>
<ul>
<li><a href="/wiki/ECW_World_Heavyweight_Championship" title="ECW World Heavyweight Championship">ECW Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_ECW_World_Heavyweight_Champions&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of ECW World Heavyweight Champions (page does not exist)">1 time</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-340" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-340">[340]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/World_Heavyweight_Championship_(WWE)" title="World Heavyweight Championship (WWE)">World Heavyweight Championship</a> (<a href="/wiki/List_of_World_Heavyweight_Champions_(WWE)" title="List of World Heavyweight Champions (WWE)">3 times</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-341" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-341">[341]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-342" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-342">[342]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-343" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-343">[343]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=WWE_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="WWE Championship (page does not exist)">WWE Championship</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_WWE_Champions&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of WWE Champions (page does not exist)">2 times</a>)<sup class="reference plainlinks nourlexpansion" id="ref_1"><a href="#endnote_1">1</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-344" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-344">[344]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-345" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-345">[345]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/World_Tag_Team_Championship_(WWE)" title="World Tag Team Championship (WWE)">World Tag Team Championship</a> (<a href="/wiki/List_of_World_Tag_Team_Champions_(WWE)" title="List of World Tag Team Champions (WWE)">1 time</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-346" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-346">[346]</a></sup> – with <a href="/w/index.php?title=Kofi_Kingston&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Kofi Kingston (page does not exist)">Kofi Kingston</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/WWE_Intercontinental_Championship" title="WWE Intercontinental Championship">WWE Intercontinental Championship</a> (<a href="/wiki/List_of_WWE_Intercontinental_Champions" title="List of WWE Intercontinental Champions">1 time</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-347" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-347">[347]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=Money_in_the_Bank_ladder_match&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Money in the Bank ladder match (page does not exist)">Money in the Bank</a> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Money_in_the_Bank_ladder_match&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Money in the Bank ladder match (page does not exist)">2008</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=Money_in_the_Bank_ladder_match&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Money in the Bank ladder match (page does not exist)">2009</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-MITBResult_74-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MITBResult-74">[74]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-MITB2_90-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MITB2-90">[90]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=Triple_Crown_Championship&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Triple Crown Championship (page does not exist)">Nineteenth Triple Crown Champion</a><sup id="cite_ref-move1_88-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-move1-88">[88]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=Slammy_Award&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Slammy Award (page does not exist)">Slammy Award</a> for "OMG" Moment of the Year (<a href="/w/index.php?title=2008_Slammy_Awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="2008 Slammy Awards (page does not exist)">2008</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-Slammy_76-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Slammy-76">[76]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li>Slammy Award for Shocker of the Year (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Slammy_Award&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Slammy Award (page does not exist)">2009</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-Slammy2_99-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Slammy2-99">[99]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li>Slammy Award for Despicable Me (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Slammy_Award&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Slammy Award (page does not exist)">2010</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-348" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-348">[348]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li>Slammy Award for Superstar of the Year (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Slammy_Award&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Slammy Award (page does not exist)">2011</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-Slammy11_7-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Slammy11-7">[7]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Slammy Award for "Pipe Bomb" of the Year (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Slammy_Award&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Slammy Award (page does not exist)">2011</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-Slammy11_7-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Slammy11-7">[7]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Slammy Award for T-Shirt of the Year (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Slammy_Award&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Slammy Award (page does not exist)">2011</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-349" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-349">[349]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li>Slammy Award for Extreme Moment of the Year (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Slammy_Award&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Slammy Award (page does not exist)">2013</a>) - for exacting revenge on <a href="/wiki/Paul_Heyman" title="Paul Heyman">Paul Heyman</a> at <a href="/w/index.php?title=Hell_in_a_Cell_(2013)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Hell in a Cell (2013) (page does not exist)">Hell in a Cell</a>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Wrestling_Observer_Newsletter_awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Wrestling Observer Newsletter awards (page does not exist)">Wrestling Observer Newsletter</a></b>
<ul>
<li> <a href="/w/index.php?title=5-star_match&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="5-star match (page does not exist)">5 Star Match</a> (2004) <small>vs. <a href="/wiki/Samoa_Joe" title="Samoa Joe">Samoa Joe</a> at <i>ROH Joe vs. Punk II</i> on October 16</small>
</li>
<li> 5 Star Match (2011) <small>vs. <a href="/wiki/John_Cena" title="John Cena">John Cena</a> at <a href="/w/index.php?title=Money_in_the_Bank_(2011)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Money in the Bank (2011) (page does not exist)">Money in the Bank</a> on July 17</small>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Wrestling_Observer_Newsletter_awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Wrestling Observer Newsletter awards (page does not exist)">Best Gimmick</a> (2009, 2011)<sup id="cite_ref-WON09_350-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WON09-350">[350]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-WON11_351-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WON11-351">[351]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Wrestling_Observer_Newsletter_awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Wrestling Observer Newsletter awards (page does not exist)">Best on Interviews</a> (2011, 2012)<sup id="cite_ref-WON11_351-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WON11-351">[351]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-WON12_352-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WON12-352">[352]</a></sup>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Wrestling_Observer_Newsletter_awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Wrestling Observer Newsletter awards (page does not exist)">Feud of the Year</a> (2009)<sup id="cite_ref-WON09_350-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WON09-350">[350]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li>Feud of the Year (2011)<sup id="cite_ref-WON11_351-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WON11-351">[351]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Wrestling_Observer_Newsletter_awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Wrestling Observer Newsletter awards (page does not exist)">Match of the Year</a> (2011)<sup id="cite_ref-WON11_351-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WON11-351">[351]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Small&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Small (page does not exist)">Template:Small</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Wrestling_Observer_Newsletter_awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Wrestling Observer Newsletter awards (page does not exist)">Best Pro Wrestling DVD</a> (2012) <small>for <i>CM Punk: Best in the World</i></small><sup id="cite_ref-WON12_352-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WON12-352">[352]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p><small>1 <span class="citation wikicite" id="endnote_1"><b><a href="#ref_1">^</a></b></span>  Punk held the title concurrently with Rey Mysterio and John Cena during his first reign. After defeating Cena, Punk became undisputed champion but was not recognized by WWE as having won the title a second time.<sup id="cite_ref-wwetitle_4-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-wwetitle-4">[4]</a></sup></small>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Luchas_de_Apuestas_record">Luchas de Apuestas record</span></h3>
<p><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Rellink&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Rellink (page does not exist)">Template:Rellink</a>
</p>
<table class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;">

<tr>
<th style="background:#e3e3e3; width:5%;">Wager
</th>
<th style="background:#e3e3e3; width:20%;">Winner
</th>
<th style="background:#e3e3e3; width:20%;">Loser
</th>
<th style="background:#e3e3e3; width:20%;">Location
</th>
<th style="background:#e3e3e3; width:15%;">Date
</th>
<th style="background:#e3e3e3; width:20%;">Notes
</th></tr>
<tr style="text-align:center;">
<td> Hair
</td>
<td>  Rey Mysterio
</td>
<td>  CM Punk
</td>
<td>  <a href="/w/index.php?title=Detroit,_Michigan&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Detroit, Michigan (page does not exist)">Detroit, Michigan</a>
</td>
<td>  <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Dts&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Dts (page does not exist)">Template:Dts</a>
</td>
<td>  S.E.S. Pledge vs. Hair match at <a href="/w/index.php?title=Over_the_Limit_(2010)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Over the Limit (2010) (page does not exist)">Over the Limit</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-353" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-353">[353]</a></sup>
</td></tr></table>
